review: Device was at it's cheapest price of $22. I couldn't resist, so had to buy it.
author: Najeeb Quadri

review: My friend and I purchased the Google Chromecast and she said it was not as easy to set up as Google states in their ads.  I returned mine and am now waiting on my Amazon Fire Stick.
author: Tracy L "Tracy"

review: Easy set-up and works perfectly.  Also handles screen mirroring  for Motorola Razr Maxx HD
author: Harry Wooga

review: Great device if you only want to watch YouTube or similar movie sites but I wanted it to mirror my computer regardless of the site.
author: Eric

review: It doesn't work with Amazon Prime, so I ordered Fire TV and it's awesome.
author: Chris Wilkins

review: Works great... Or is simply broken.
author: NoVey
